article: One day Yu Mei  goes  shopping with her mother. When they get  _  the supermarket,Yu Mei is very  _  .There are many things and many people  _  it.Her mother tells Yu Mei  to follow  her. They walk here and there and they  _  some things. When they come to a shelf ,Yu Mei  _  some boxes of chocolates.She wants her mother to buy some  _  her.Her mother gives  her  a box of brown chocolates. Yu Mei shakes her head and says, "I want a box of white chocolates." " Why?"asks her mother. "I can't bite my fingers when I eat them  _  night,"answers Yu Mei quickly.
